ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and are constant in their Prayer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who are regular in their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who with their Salah are Da'imun;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who are constant at their prayer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who are constant at their worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who are at their prayer constant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: those who persevere in their prayers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who remain steadfast to their prayer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who remain constant in their Salat (prayers);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who are constant at their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those who are constant in their prayer
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:23] those who maintain, [those who] regularly observe, their prayers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then explained the traits of the latter, saying: (Who are constant at their worship) they constantly perform their prescribed daily prayers, whether it is at night or in the day, and they never fail to perform them.
